description:
Cardio Pulmonary Resuscitation (CPR) is an essential and necessary skill for all persons. This course will take the student through the origins of CPR, The legal systems that regulate it, and organizations creating national and international standards for it. It will explain how CPR has be come more than just a part of First Aid. The course will explain how CPR has become an international force reshaping our world. This includes material for persons who need, or want an in depth refresher, or first timers wanting an in depth course in CPR, this course is for you. Using common house hold items, such as a tennis balls or soccer balls you can learn effective CPR. This is the most complete course on CPR today.

This course is in compliance with the 2010consessus. If you are interested in certification contact us at the Arthur Jackson CTC website
title: Cardio Pulmonary Resuscitation (CPR)
